Description:
SCENIC, SAVVY AND SECURE
This as new 4 bedroom home is located in one of the prettiest spots of the Sandhurst Club estate. Overlooking manicured parkland with the 8th fairway of the Champions golf course beyond, you could be forgiven for thinking you were a million miles from the hustle and bustle.
Built by the award winning Latitude 37 Homes, this contemporary property is sleek, streamlined and offers an array of on trend finishes so many are seeking today.
The front door opens to a light filled entrance hall creating a welcoming atmosphere.
The hostess kitchen with enormous stone island bench overlooks the family and dining rooms which in turn open out to the lovely rear garden. With a decked alfresco zone for year round entertaining, you will be hosting many a gathering.
A cleverly designed study nook is ideal for those working from home or for the kids to do their homework whilst still being close to the action.
Upstairs you will find 4 generous bedrooms. The master suite has its own private balcony capturing the view beyond. it truly is a special place. Enhanced by a sleek ensuite and generous walk in robe, it's the perfect haven at the end of the working day.
The other 3 bedrooms all offer built in robes and are fresh and bright.
There is a comfortable sitting room at the top of the stairs, the ideal spot to curl up with a good book. This area could also be used as a larger study or craft room.
Low maintenance fully landscaped gardens surround the home creating a calming effect.
Ducted heating, 6KW solar, 24hr patrolled home security, fibre optic network for ultra high speed internet and family membership to the magnificent Sandhurst Members and Health Club provide a lifestyle like no other.
Inspect at your earliest convenience, it is guaranteed to please.
